entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY THIS EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND 16
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 20S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 15
WEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST IN THE AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLEAR
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 10 ABOVE
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 20S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S

MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF RAIN IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
RAIN LIKELY, MAINLY IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS AROUND 40
LOWS AROUND 20

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 20S
